io.spine.validate

Class FieldValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.validate.FieldValue

  • @Immutable
 @Internal
public final class FieldValue
extends java.lang.Object
    A field value to validate.

    The exact type of the value is unknown since it is set by a user who applies a generated validating builder.

    Map fields are considered in a special way, and only values are validated. Keys don't require validation since they are of primitive types.

    See Also:
    Protobuf Maps

      • javaType

        public com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FieldDescriptor.JavaType javaType()
        Obtains the Descriptors.FieldDescriptor.JavaType of the value.

        For a map, returns the type of the values.

        Returns:
        Descriptors.FieldDescriptor.JavaType of the field elements

      • asList

        @Deprecated
public final com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<?> asList()
        Deprecated. Use values() instead.
        Converts the value to a list.
        Returns:
        the value as a list

      • values

        public final java.util.stream.Stream<?> values()
        Creates a stream of all the values of this field.

        If the field is singular, obtains the only value. If the field is repeated, obtains all the values of the list. If the field is a map, obtains all the map values (but not the keys).

      • nonDefault

        public final java.util.stream.Stream<?> nonDefault()
        Creates a stream of non-default values of this field.

        Behaves similarly to values() but also filters out default values.

        0 number values, false boolean values, 0-number enum instances, empty char and byte strings, and empty messages are considered default values.

      • singleValue

        public java.lang.Object singleValue()
        Obtains the single value of this field.

        If the field is a collection, obtains the first element. If the first element is not available, throws an IllegalStateException.

        Returns:
        a single value of this field

      • isDefault

        public boolean isDefault()
        Returns true if this field is default, false otherwise.

      • declaration

        public FieldDeclaration declaration()
        Returns the declaration of the value.

      • context

        public FieldContext context()
        Returns the context of the value.
